paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Moreover, in the screening of the other two sisters P41 and P42, the same pathogenic mutation in BRCA2 (c.1907C>G) was identified.
Moreover, in the screening of the other two sisters P41 and P42, the same pathogenic mutation in BRCA2 (c.1907C>G) was identified.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: No additional functional data or population frequency provided.
key_quotes: Moreover, in the screening of the other two sisters P41 and P42, the same pathogenic mutation in BRCA2 (c.1907C>G) was identified.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Moreover, five pathogenic mutations, which are, c.1016delA in BRCA1 gene, c.1907C>G in BRCA2 gene, c.3331C>T in BRCA1 gene, c.5566C>T in BRCA1 gene and c.682-2A>G in BRCA2 gene were found to be present in 2/144 cases.

Moreover, five pathogenic mutations, which are, c.1016delA in BRCA1 gene, c.1907C>G in BRCA2 gene, c.3331C>T in BRCA1 gene, c.5566C>T in BRCA1 gene and c.682-2A>G in BRCA2 gene were found to be present in 2/144 cases.

variants.segregation_data: The mutation segregates with disease in the family.
variants.additional_notes: No additional functional data or population frequency provided.
key_quotes: Moreover, five pathogenic mutations, which are, c.1016delA in BRCA1 gene, c.1907C>G in BRCA2 gene, c.3331C>T in BRCA1 gene, c.5566C>T in BRCA1 gene and c.682-2A>G in BRCA2 gene were found to be present in 2/144 cases.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data for BRCA2 variants were extracted successfully.
